00041 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS *************************/
00043 #define VIRTUAL_QEI_SIGNAL      1
00044 
00050 #define SIGNAL_MODE             0
00051 
00057 #define CAP_MODE                        1
00058 
00060 #define CAP_PERIOD                      250000UL
00061 
00063 #define DISP_TIME                       3000000UL
00064 
00065 #define MAX_CAP_TIMES           (DISP_TIME/CAP_PERIOD)
00066 
00067 #define ENC_RES                         2048UL  
00070 /* In case of using Virtual QEI signal, these following macros must be defined */
00071 #ifdef VIRTUAL_QEI_SIGNAL
00072 /* Max velocity */
00073 #define MAX_VEL                         600UL   
00074 #if CAP_MODE
00075 #define COUNT_MODE                      4
00076 #else
00077 #define COUNT_MODE                      2
00078 #endif
00079 #endif
00080 
00081 /* Pin on Port 0 assigned to Phase A */
00082 #define PHASE_A_PIN                     (1<<19)
00083 /* Pin on Port 0 assigned to Phase B */
00084 #define PHASE_B_PIN                     (1<<21)
00085 
00086 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00087 #ifdef VIRTUAL_QEI_SIGNAL
00088 
00094 __IO uint8_t PhaseCnt;
00095 #endif /* VIRTUAL_QEI_SIGNAL */
00096 
00098 __IO uint64_t VeloAcc;
00100 __IO uint32_t VeloCapCnt;
00102 __IO FlagStatus VeloAccFlag;
00103 
00104 
00105 /* Pin Configuration selection must be defined in structure following:
00106  * - Port Number,
00107  * - Pin Number,
00108  * - Function Number,
00109  * - Pin Mode,
00110  * - Open Drain
00111  */
00112 
00114 const PINSEL_CFG_Type qei_phaA_pin[1] = {{1, 20, 1, 0, 0}};
00116 const PINSEL_CFG_Type qei_phaB_pin[1] = {{1, 23, 1, 0, 0}};
00118 const PINSEL_CFG_Type qei_idx_pin[1] = {{1, 24, 1, 0, 0}};

00129 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00130 #ifdef VIRTUAL_QEI_SIGNAL
00131 /*********************************************************************/
00137 void TIMER0_IRQHandler(void)
00138 {
00139         if (TIM_GetIntStatus(LPC_TIM0,TIM_MR0_INT)) {
00140 
00141                 // Set/Clear phase A/B pin corresponding to their state
00142                 switch (PhaseCnt) {
00143                 case 0:
00144                         GPIO_SetValue(0,PHASE_A_PIN);
00145                         GPIO_ClearValue(0,PHASE_B_PIN);
00146                         break;
00147                 case 1:
00148                         GPIO_SetValue(0, PHASE_A_PIN | PHASE_B_PIN);
00149                         break;
00150                 case 2:
00151                         GPIO_SetValue(0, PHASE_B_PIN);
00152                         GPIO_ClearValue(0, PHASE_A_PIN);
00153                         break;
00154                 case 3:
00155                         GPIO_ClearValue(0, PHASE_A_PIN | PHASE_B_PIN);
00156                         break;
00157 
00158                 default:
00159                         break;
00160                 }
00161 
00162                 // update PhaseCnt
00163                 PhaseCnt = (PhaseCnt + 1) & 0x03;
00164 
00165                 // Clear Timer 0 match interrupt pending
00166                 TIM_ClearIntPending(LPC_TIM0,TIM_MR0_INT);
00167         }
00168 }
00169 #endif
00170 /*********************************************************************/
00176 void QEI_IRQHandler(void)
00177 {
00178         // Check whether if velocity timer overflow
00179         if (QEI_GetIntStatus(LPC_QEI, QEI_INTFLAG_TIM_Int) == SET) {
00180                 if (VeloAccFlag == RESET) {
00181 
00182                         // Get current velocity captured and update to accumulate
00183                         VeloAcc += QEI_GetVelocityCap(LPC_QEI);
00184 
00185                         // Update Velocity capture times
00186                         VeloAccFlag = ((VeloCapCnt++) >= MAX_CAP_TIMES) ? SET : RESET;
00187                 }
00188                 // Reset Interrupt flag pending
00189                 QEI_IntClear(LPC_QEI, QEI_INTFLAG_TIM_Int);
00190         }
00191 
00192         // Check whether if direction change occurred
00193         if (QEI_GetIntStatus(LPC_QEI, QEI_INTFLAG_DIR_Int) == SET) {
00194                 // Print direction status
00195                 _DBG("Direction has changed: ");
00196                 _DBG_((QEI_GetStatus(LPC_QEI, QEI_STATUS_DIR) == SET) ? "1" : "0");
00197                 // Reset Interrupt flag pending
00198                 QEI_IntClear(LPC_QEI, QEI_INTFLAG_DIR_Int);
00199         }
00200 }
00201 
00202 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00203 #ifdef VIRTUAL_QEI_SIGNAL
00204 /*********************************************************************/
00226 void VirtualQEISignal_Init(void)
00227 {
00228         uint32_t pclk;
00229         TIM_TIMERCFG_Type TimerConfig;
00230         TIM_MATCHCFG_Type TimerMatchConfig;
00231 
00232         _DBG_("Initializing Virtual QEI signal...");
00233 
00234         // Initialize timer 0, Prescale value in tick value option with tick value = 1
00235         TimerConfig.PrescaleOption = TIM_PRESCALE_TICKVAL;
00236         TimerConfig.PrescaleValue       = 1;
00237         TIM_Init(LPC_TIM0, TIM_TIMER_MODE,&TimerConfig);
00238 
00239         // Get actual peripheral clock of timer 0
00240         pclk = CLKPWR_GetPCLK(CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_TIMER0);
00241         pclk = pclk / ((MAX_VEL * ENC_RES * COUNT_MODE) / 60 );
00242         // Set match for match channel 0
00243         TimerMatchConfig.MatchChannel = 0;
00244         TimerMatchConfig.MatchValue = pclk;
00245         TimerMatchConfig.IntOnMatch = ENABLE;
00246         TimerMatchConfig.ExtMatchOutputType = 3;
00247         TimerMatchConfig.ResetOnMatch = ENABLE;
00248         TimerMatchConfig.StopOnMatch = DISABLE;
00249         TIM_ConfigMatch(LPC_TIM0, &TimerMatchConfig);
00250 
00251         // Reconfigures GPIO for pin used as Phase A and Phase B output
00252         GPIO_SetDir(0, PHASE_A_PIN | PHASE_B_PIN, 1);
00253         // Set default State after initializing
00254         GPIO_ClearValue(0, PHASE_A_PIN | PHASE_B_PIN);
00255         // Reset Phase Counter
00256         PhaseCnt = 0;
00257 
00258         /* preemption = 1, sub-priority = 2 */
00259         NVIC_SetPriority(TIMER0_IRQn, ((0x02<<3)|0x01));
00260         /* Enable interrupt for timer 0 */
00261         NVIC_EnableIRQ(TIMER0_IRQn);
00262         // To start timer 0
00263         TIM_Cmd(LPC_TIM0,ENABLE);
00264 }
00265 #endif /* VIRTUAL_QEI_SIGNAL */
00266 
00267 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00268 /*********************************************************************/
00273 int c_entry(void)
00274 {
00275         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00276         QEI_CFG_Type QEIConfig;
00277         QEI_RELOADCFG_Type ReloadConfig;
00278         uint32_t rpm, averageVelo;
00279 
00280         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00281          * – 115200bps
00282          * – 8 data bit
00283          * – No parity
00284          * – 1 stop bit
00285          * – No flow control
00286          */
00287         debug_frmwrk_init();
00288         _DBG_("Hello QEI ...");
00289         _DBG("Speed will be sampled every each ");
00290         _DBD32(CAP_PERIOD);
00291         _DBG_(" us");
00292         _DBG_("This value will be accumulated to display as RPM after every each");
00293         _DBD32(DISP_TIME);
00294         _DBG_(" us");
00295 
00296         /* Initialize QEI configuration structure to default value */
00297 #if CAP_MODE
00298         QEIConfig.CaptureMode = QEI_CAPMODE_4X;
00299 #else
00300         QEIConfig.CaptureMode = QEI_CAPMODE_2X;
00301 #endif
00302         QEIConfig.DirectionInvert = QEI_DIRINV_NONE;
00303         QEIConfig.InvertIndex = QEI_INVINX_NONE;
00304 #if SIGNAL_MODE
00305         QEIConfig.SignalMode = QEI_SIGNALMODE_CLKDIR;
00306 #else
00307         QEIConfig.SignalMode = QEI_SIGNALMODE_QUAD;
00308 #endif
00309 
00310         /* Set QEI function pin
00311          * P1.20: MCI0
00312          * P1.23: MCI1
00313          * P1.24: MCI2
00314          */
00315         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00316         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00317         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00318         PinCfg.Portnum = 1;
00319         PinCfg.Pinnum = 20;
00320         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00321         PinCfg.Pinnum = 23;
00322         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00323         PinCfg.Pinnum = 24;
00324         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00325 
00326         /* Initialize QEI peripheral with given configuration structure */
00327         QEI_Init(LPC_QEI, &QEIConfig);
00328 
00329         // Set timer reload value for  QEI that used to set velocity capture period
00330         ReloadConfig.ReloadOption = QEI_TIMERRELOAD_USVAL;
00331         ReloadConfig.ReloadValue = CAP_PERIOD;
00332         QEI_SetTimerReload(LPC_QEI, &ReloadConfig);
00333 
00334         /* preemption = 1, sub-priority = 1 */
00335         NVIC_SetPriority(QEI_IRQn, ((0x01<<3)|0x01));
00336         /* Enable interrupt for QEI  */
00337         NVIC_EnableIRQ(QEI_IRQn);
00338 
00339         // Reset VeloAccFlag
00340         VeloAccFlag = RESET;
00341         // Reset value of Acc and Acc count to default
00342         VeloAcc = 0;
00343         VeloCapCnt = 0;
00344 
00345         // Enable interrupt for velocity Timer overflow for capture velocity into Acc */
00346         QEI_IntCmd(LPC_QEI, QEI_INTFLAG_TIM_Int, ENABLE);
00347         // Enable interrupt for direction change */
00348         QEI_IntCmd(LPC_QEI, QEI_INTFLAG_DIR_Int, ENABLE);
00349 
00350 #ifdef VIRTUAL_QEI_SIGNAL
00351         // This used for generating virtual QEI signal
00352         VirtualQEISignal_Init();
00353 #endif
00354 
00355         // Main loop
00356         while (1) {
00357 
00358                 // Check VeloAccFlag continuously
00359                 if (VeloAccFlag == SET) {
00360                         // Get Acc
00361                         averageVelo = (uint32_t)(VeloAcc / VeloCapCnt);
00362                         rpm = QEI_CalculateRPM(LPC_QEI, averageVelo, ENC_RES);
00363                         // Disp the result
00364                         _DBG("Sampling Speed: ");
00365                         _DBD32(rpm);
00366                         _DBG_("RPM");
00367                         // Reset VeloAccFlag
00368                         VeloAccFlag = RESET;
00369                         // Reset value of Acc and Acc count to default
00370                         VeloAcc = 0;
00371                         VeloCapCnt = 0;
00372                 }
00373         }
00374     return 1;
00375 }
00376 
00377 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00378    allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00379    heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00380    toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00381    file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00382 int main(void)
00383 {
00384     return c_entry();
00385 }

00390 * @brief                Reports the name of the source file and the source line number

00392 * @param[in]    file Pointer to the source file name
00393 * @param[in]    line assert_param error line source number
00394 * @return               None
00395 *******************************************************************************/
00396 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line)
00397 {
00398         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00399          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00400 
00401         /* Infinite loop */
00402         while(1);
00403 }
